title: Solving PDEs with Unmeasurable Source Terms Using Coupled Physics-Informed Neural Network with Recurrent Prediction in Soft Sensor Modeling. (arXiv:2301.08618v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Nonhomogeneous partial differential equations (PDEs) are an applicable model in soft sensor modeling for describing spatiotemporal industrial systems with unmeasurable source terms, which cannot be well solved by existing physics-informed neural networks (PINNs). To this end, a coupled PINN (CPINN) with a recurrent prediction (RP) learning strategy (CPINN-RP) is proposed for soft sensor modeling in spatiotemporal industrial processes, such as vibration displacement. translated_title: 使用循环预测耦合物理信息神经网络在软传感建模中求解含非测量源项的PDEs
translated_abstract: 针对含非测量源项的非齐次偏微分方程（PDEs）在软传感建模中难以很好解决的问题，本文提出了一种带循环预测（RP）学习策略的耦合物理信息神经网络（CPINN）来进行软传感建模。首先，提出了包含NetU和NetG的CPINN，其中NetU用于近似研究PDEs的解，NetG用于正则化NetU的训练，两个网络被集成到一个数据-物理混合损失函数中。随后，在理论上证明了所提出的CPINN具有满足PDEs解的近似容量。此外，我们提出了一种分层训练策略来优化和耦合两个网络以实现CPINN的参数。其次，通过在NetU中引入循环机制来进行未来状态的预测，提出了NetU-RP，以提高软传感建模在时空工业系统中的性能表现。最后，通过模拟振动位移系统的例子，演示了所提出的CPINN-RP方法在求解含非测量源项的PDEs和软传感建模应用中的有效性。
tldr: 提出了一种带循环预测学习策略的耦合物理信息神经网络（CPINN），用于软传感建模中的含非测量源项的PDEs求解，证明了CPINN具有满足PDEs解的近似容量，提高了软传感建模在时空工业系统中的性能表现。
en_tdlr: A coupled physics-informed neural network (CPINN) with a recurrent prediction (RP) learning strategy is proposed for solving nonhomogeneous partial differential equations (PDEs) with unmeasurable source terms in soft sensor modeling, which has a satisfying approximation capacity to the PDEs solutions and can improve the performance of soft sensor modeling in spatiotemporal industrial systems.
